sentences: At the SBI Plenary on Tuesday, 11 June, Chair Estrada drew attention to the proposed improved guidelines (FCCC/SBI/2002/INF.2).
The US called for a discussion on timeframes, and made a specific proposal in this regard.
She also proposed that the CGE use national communications to assess opportunities for mitigation and adaptation in developing countries.
An informal group convened in closed-door discussions, and conclusions were adopted on Friday, 14 June.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
